item.title: CVE-2023-20851|2024-10-01T13:01:09.937Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt8188
item.description: In stc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS08048635; Issue ID: ALPS08048635.
